newsitem.title: USA: Egan Systems developing COBOL tools.
newsitem.headline: Egan Systems developing COBOL tools.

text.p: Egan Systems Inc said Monday that, through its subsidiary Envyr Corp, it is actively developing a suite of software tools intended to reduce the time, manpower, and expense required to locate and address the Year 2000 or millenium-related problems frequently found in COBOL source code.

Egan said the development and sale of COBOL dialects has been its main business for the last nine years and the company is enhancing aspects of its existing technology as well as developing new capabilities to create the aforementioned software tools.
The company declined to say when these products will be introduced or to forecast their impact on revenues.
